rows.label: bf08490100_0010
rows.name:
Boss!
The Iira ship stopped moving!

rows.label: bf08490100_0020
rows.name: Looks to me like they're gonna try and get inside!

rows.label: bf08490100_0030
rows.name:
Marveni!
We're going to stop Shin!

rows.label: bf08490100_0040
rows.name: But you've got to stop this!

rows.label: bf08490100_0050
rows.name: You're speaking nonsense, boy.

rows.label: bf08490100_0055
rows.name: Now is the hour of their doom.

rows.label: bf08490100_0060
rows.name: You leave me no choice but to perform your duty for you.

rows.label: bf08490100_0070
rows.name:
Destroying Shin and Iira?
We're only trying to stop them!

rows.label: bf08490100_0080
rows.name: Not kill them!

rows.label: bf08490100_0090
rows.name: You believe you can sway them with words of reason?

rows.label: bf08490100_0100
rows.name: Well, yes!

rows.label: bf08490100_0110
rows.name:
Shin told me what happened.
What happened 500 years ago.

rows.label: bf08490100_0120
rows.name: And you were the cause of it, weren't you, Pope?

rows.label: bf08490100_0130
rows.name: I was but a proxy for God's words.

rows.label: bf08490100_0140
rows.name: When I meet him, I'll ask him myself!

rows.label: bf08490100_0142
rows.name: About me, about Homura and Hikari!

rows.label: bf08490100_0150
rows.name: That is my role, not yours!

rows.label: bf08490100_0160
rows.name: Ah!

rows.label: bf08490100_0170
rows.name: Hngh! You resist?

rows.label: bf08490100_0175
rows.name: Again? You reject me again?!

rows.label: bf08490100_0180
rows.name: Marveni! You won't get what you want!

rows.label: bf08490100_0190
rows.name: I...I'm...Rex's Blade!

rows.label: bf08490100_0200
rows.name:
Th-that's right!
Rex! You're the Holy Grail's Driver!

rows.label: bf08490100_0210
rows.name: There's nothing he can do that you can't!

rows.label: bf08490100_0220
rows.name: Does that mean...?

rows.label: bf08490100_0230
rows.name: Rex, it's true!

rows.label: bf08490100_0232
rows.name: Power depends on the heart of its wielder... Right?

rows.label: bf08490100_0240
rows.name: Hyaaaarrrgh!
